title: ''

---

- If a specific game is not launching, crashing, or experiencing bugs, there's nothing I can do, as I'm not a Proton or GPU driver developer.
- Please make sure Faugus Launcher is up to date before reporting an issue.
- Please specify which distro you are using and whether you are using the native or Flatpak version of Faugus Launcher.
